welcome.title: Welcome to SNX staking
welcome.subtitle: The dApp for SNX holders. If you've never staked SNX before, read through this quick introduction first.

what.title: What is Synthetix?
what.subtitle: Synthetix is a derivatives liquidity protocol on Ethereum. It enables the creation of synthetic assets (Synths) by staking SNX, and these Synths can be traded for each other directly with the Synthetix smart contracts on dApps such as Kwenta.

why.title: Why stake SNX?
why.subtitle: SNX stakers receive two kinds of rewards. Firstly, they receive SNX staking rewards, which are created through the inflationary monetary policy. Secondly, there’s Synth exchange rewards, which are denominated in sUSD and generated by all peer-to-contract Synth trades.

mint-burn.title: Minting & Burning
mint-burn.subtitle: All Synths need to be backed by staked SNX at a Target Collateralisation Ratio, configurable by community governance. SNX stakers need to manage their own ratio to be above this figure, which they can do by burning sUSD to increase their ratio or minting sUSD to reduce it. If they do this, they can collect weekly rewards.

risks.title: What are the risks?
risks.subtitle: All SNX stakers create a ‘debt’ when they stake. Their debt begins as the amount of sUSD they initially mint, and fluctuates according to gains or losses made by other Synth holders. Any time anyone holds a Synth that appreciates in value, that gain is distributed proportionally between all the staked SNX holders’ debts. A staker must pay off their debt before they can unlock their staked SNX.

claim.title: CLAIM
claim.ratio-notice: To claim rewards, you must be within 1% of the Target Collateralization Ratio. You must burn sUSD or obtain more SNX to fix your ratio.

info.title: Vest your SNX staking rewards in escrow
info.title-migrate-l1: Migrate to new L1 escrow contract
info.subtitle: If you have staked your SNX and minted sUSD, you are eligible to receive SNX staking rewards, which will be escrowed here which you can vest in 12 months from the claim date.
info.subtitle-migrate-l1: As per <0>SIP-60</0>,  a new SNX Escrow Contact has been released with new features (including L2 migration). All SNX holders are required to migrate their escrowed SNX before they can vest any escrowed SNX.

info.title: Vest your escrowed SNX from the token sale.
info.subtitle: If you have escrowed SNX from the token sale, you can vest it here.

in-progress.title: Vesting in progress
in-progress.subtext: Waiting for the blockchain to confirm your transaction

info.title: Deposit SNX
info.subtitle: Deposit your SNX to complete the process of migrating your SNX from L1 to L2. You may experience a delay during the migration process before your SNX is available on L2
info.metamask-only: You are about to migrate funds to L2. Only Metamask is supported on L2, so make sure you are depositing from a Metamask wallet or a wallet that allows you to export your private key to Metamask.
info.layer2-withdraw-delay: Once on L2, if you wish to withdraw your funds back to L1 it will take 7-10 days. On L2 there is currently limited functionality, including disabled transfers, and no usage for sUSD.
info.layer2-rewards: SNX rewards for the first few weeks are low: Rewards will be 25k SNX a week for the 2 weeks between 2/1 and 2/15. Then, the synthetixDAO will assess the option of increasing the SNX rewards to incentivise further migration.

info.warning-description: Migrating escrowed SNX to Layer 2 cannot be reversed
